text: The weekend conference for the men and their wives, which takes place at company expense in a country or resort hotel, includes an address on 'The Woman's Point of View' and one on 'Making the Most of Health. Separate discussions are arranged for the wives in addition to the plenary sessions. Of the men reaching fifty years of age since the scheme started, 125 (37.2 per cent) have taken part.
